body_html:
@mythmon Ready for review.

I've switched the stylelint stuff from using webpack to using the CLI. The stylelint docs (and related issues) all indicate to install with the -g flag, probably so npm can handle adding the command to your PATH and all that.

To remedy the stylelint: command not found issue, I used a bin key in package.json, which locally sets the stylelint command and lets us use the CLI in things like npm run lint-css. Let me know if this works for you.
